## [0.2.0](https://github.com/liblaf/cspell-init/releases/tag/v0.2.0) - 2025-11-04

### üí• BREAKING CHANGES

- **(cli)** The CLI flag `--save-config` has been renamed to `--saveConfig`. Users should update their scripts or command calls accordingly. - [f27cc1d](https://github.com/liblaf/cspell-init/commit/f27cc1da9a24c9aee4a4a1d2c4f658ffe234389c) by [@liblaf](https://github.com/liblaf)
